Detailed Description

cvmx_bgx::_spu::_br_status2

This register implements a combination of the following Std 802.3 registers: * BASE-R PCS status 2 (MDIO address 3.33). * BASE-R BER high-order counter (MDIO address 3.44). * Errored-blocks high-order counter (MDIO address 3.45).

Note that the relative locations of some fields have been moved from Std 802.3 in order to make the register layout more software friendly: the BER counter high-order and low-order bits from sections 3.44 and 3.33 have been combined into the contiguous, 22-bit [BER_CNT] field; likewise, the errored-blocks counter high-order and low-order bits from section 3.45 have been combined into the contiguous, 22-bit [ERR_BLKS] field.
